messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: If we have a roboticist on-deck, please cooperate with Security to manufact a patrol cyborg. P.S. note delivered to office, says 'big poopies detected'. Sec please seek out this prankster.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Roboticist needs brain. Any crewmembers with depression or otherwise, please consent to these necessary. . .er, sacrifices.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I KILLED THE CAPTAIN HEHEHEHEHE TIME TO GO HOME!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Guess who killed your captain? ME GREGORY WRIGHT! SO NOW IM THE NEW CAPTAIN!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Gregory Wright. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I WANT YOU ALL TO COME IN FRONT OF BRIDGE NOW OR I WILL HUNT YOU DOWN|

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Spacepizza Division

Cargo: It looks like a neighbouring station accidentally delivered their pizza to you instead
